DataElement.preferredName: Child Prior Diagnosis School Grade Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text field to indicate the grade in school prior to diagnosis.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who is not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose._Earlier in time or order._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._An educational institution._A position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A son or daughter of any age, including biological offspring and sometimes including unborn children, adopted children, stepchildren, foster children and children born outside of marriage; person under an age specified by law.

Concepts.definition: An age group comprised of individuals who are not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
A position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
